Codes.CodeNotes: Indicates a short text summary of the accessibility of the product or content
Conforms to the LIA Compliance Scheme requirements
Conforms to EPUB Accessibility 1.0 (no WCAG level specified)
Conforms to EPUB Accessibility 1.0 with WCAG 2.0 Level A
Conforms to EPUB Accessibility 1.0 with WCAG 2.0 Level AA
Conforms to EPUB Accessibility 1.0 with WCAG 2.0 Level AAA
Conforms to EPUB Accessibility 1.1 with WCAG 2.1 Level A
Conforms to EPUB Accessibility 1.1 with WCAG 2.1 Level AA
Conforms to EPUB Accessibility 1.1 with WCAG 2.1 Level AAA
Conforms to EPUB Accessibility 1.1 with WCAG 2.2 Level A
Conforms to EPUB Accessibility 1.1 with WCAG 2.2 Level AA
Conforms to EPUB Accessibility 1.1 with WCAG 2.2 Level AAA

Codes.CodeDescription: All textual content can be modified
Codes.CodeNotes: Text can be resized, line height, spacing etc can be modified
Content includes appropriate language tagging for text-to-speech

Codes.CodeDescription: No reading system accessibility options disabled
Codes.CodeNotes: Content does not disable reading system features like text-to-speech
Content includes a table of contents that provides links to the major sections
Content includes an index that provides direct access to specific content
Content reading order is defined to ensure logical reading sequence
Short alternative descriptions provided for images and graphics
Full alternative descriptions provided for images and graphics

Codes.CodeDescription: Visualized data also available as non-graphical data
Codes.CodeNotes: Charts, graphs and other visual representations are also available as non-visual data
Rich content like video has accessibility features like captions
Mathematical content uses MathML
Chemical content uses ChemML
Print-equivalent page numbers are included
Content includes synchronized pre-recorded audio narration
Includes SSML or other text-to-speech hinting to improve pronunciation
Content has been specifically designed for dyslexic readers
